channel.title: Compiler Problem
channel.description:
When I use my compiler it says:
[code]'javac' is not recognised as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...[/code]
I have the newest JDK and I went through all the batch files and changed the JDK from java-3.0.06 or 07 to java-3.0.11. I remember from my old server that I have to change my compiler from:
[code]@echo off COLOR 09 title ExampleScape Compiler javac *.java pause[/code]
To some really long code. If anybody has the long code please post it or tell me how to fix it right now im using a PhoneScape source (which is terrible.. Read sig)
If it helps speeds things up I will give credit to you in my help menu or have a NPC in my server talking about how great you are :D :rolleyes:

item.title: Compiler Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tatertot3312 Tatertot3312
item.description:
@Tatertot3312 wrote:

When I use my compiler it says:

'javac' is not recognised as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...

I have the newest JDK and I went through all the batch files and changed the JDK from java-3.0.06 or 07 to java-3.0.11. I remember from my old server that I have to change my compiler from:

@echo off COLOR 09 title ExampleScape Compiler javac *.java pause

To some really long code. If anybody has the long code please post it or tell me how to fix it right now im using a PhoneScape source (which is terrible… Read sig)

If it helps speeds things up I will give credit to you in my help menu or have a NPC in my server talking about how great you are :rolleyes:
